name: Sunflower Slap
description:
Join the #slaputin flashmob and slap some sense into the world's most hated dude!

The game is mobile-oriented. Play from your mobile device for best experience.

Post your results to social media with #slaputin hashtag and see how you can help Ukraine in its fight for freedom: 

https://kyivindependent.com/opinion/victor-tregubov-are-you-a-foreigner-who-want...

Stand with Ukraine! 💙💛
